subject: Olympic Games (2016)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The president made a pitch for Chicago’s bid and said Michelle Obama, a lifelong Chicagoan, will lead the U.S. contingent when the I.O.C. votes on a host city Oct. 2.
snippet: The president made a pitch for Chicago’s bid and said Michelle Obama, a lifelong Chicagoan, will lead the U.S. contingent when the I.O.C. votes on a host city Oct. 2.
